pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.1: When it comes to the offenses that are a result of having sexual intercourse, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues are they settled?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.3: they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted;
pli-tv-pvr1.15:1.4: or they may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass. …
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.1: When it comes to the offense that is a result of, out of disrespect, defecating, urinating, or spitting in water, through how many of the seven principles for settling legal issues is it settled?
pli-tv-pvr1.15:2.3: it may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by acting according to what has been admitted; or it may be settled by resolution face-to-face and by covering over as if with grass.
pli-tv-pvr1.15:3.1: The seventh section on settling is finished.
